title: EEC Council: Decision on the application to Algeria and to the French overseas departments of the provisions of the Treaty concerning capital movements
header:
DECISION on the application to Algeria and to the French overseas departments of the provisions of the Treaty concerning capital movements
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY
main_body: Articles 67 to 73 of the Treaty, and the provisions of Article 106 concerning the movement of capital, shall apply to Algeria and to the French overseas departments.
This Decision shall enter into force on 11 May 1960.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 11 May 1960.
